alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 13 at 2:25PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on east west oriented roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility to under 1 mile at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
